restaurants.name: Curry World
restaurants.info: Using the freshest ingredients, Curry World offers  flavorful curries from Thailand, India, Japan, and other countries.  Pick a hearty deep red Mussaman curry from northern Thailand.  Or, how about a creamy and rich Tikka Masala?  A smooth traditional Japanese brown curry?  No matter what flavor your customers desire, Curry World has the right variety to satisfy your curry cravings.

restaurants.name: Grand Pacific
restaurants.info: Our restaurant is relaxing and friendly, with large floor to ceiling windows to take in the stunning views.

restaurants.name: Chinese Noodles
restaurants.info: We are specialised in the art of noodle making. With over 30 years of experiece, Chinese Noodles is bound to satisfy your needs of various noodle varieties.

restaurants.name: Heart Cafe
restaurants.info: Heart Cafe is now nourishing both the body and the soul with organic, gluten free and vegan options in a warm, connecting space where friends and neighbors come together.

restaurants.name: McDonald's Liverpool
restaurants.info: With more than one million of you coming through our restaurants every day, it’s our priority to maintain your trust and integrity. To do this we make sure our customers and employees receive the respect they deserve.

restaurants.name: Smokey's Kebabs
restaurants.address: 109 George's River Road, Croydon Park, NSW

restaurants.name: Subway Croydon Park
restaurants.address: 33 Georges River Road, Croydon Park, NSW

items.name: Naan Bread
items.description: Indian style bread cooked to order in our tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Garlic Naan
items.description: Our original Naan Bread brushed with our fresh garlic spread.

items.name: Samosa
items.description: A spiced potato and green pea filled indian dumpling served with coriander chutney.

items.name: Yellow Curry (Thailand)
items.description: Our vegan Thai offering. Mild peppers, lemon grass, ginger and lots of spices make this the most 'Curry' tasting Thai.

items.name: Tikka Masala (England)
items.description: Our Tikka is a bit more Evolved than most and it shows in its' big flavor. Thick, rich & creamy.

items.name: Murgh Masala
items.description: Classic Indian tomato based curry. Kind of like a standard tikka masala.

items.name: Coconut Ice Cream
items.description: Handmade in our very own kitchen topped with toasted cocunut.

items.name: Banana Fritters
items.description: A banana sprinkled with sugar, fried in a crispy egg roll wrapper and drizzled with caramel sauce.

items.name: House Loaf
items.description: Aged balsamic vinegar, virgin olive oil & olive tapenade.

items.name: Soup Of The Day
items.description: Fresh crusty bread.

items.name: Potato Gnocchi
items.description: Tomato & okra ragu.

items.name: Tasmanian Black Mussels
items.description: Steamed thai green curry sauce, basmati rice & bok choi.

items.name: Linguini Pasta
items.description: Black mussels, tiger prawns, scallops, chilli, garlic, fresh herbs & olive oil.

items.name: Chicken Breast
items.description: Potatoes, carrot pudding souffles and mango relish.

items.name: Lemon Tart
items.description: Cream or ice cream.

items.name: Warm Chocolate Cake
items.description: With cream or ice cream.

items.name: Shallot Pancakes
items.description: Unleavened flatbread folded with oil and minced scallions.

items.name: Hot & Sour Soup with Pork
items.description: Meat soup with day lily buds, wood ear fungus, bamboo shoots, and tofu flavored with pork blood.

items.name: Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with individual grains and is lightly seasoned to allow the flavor of the rice to dominate.

items.name: Stirfried Noodles
items.description: Noodles fried with ginger, garlic, carrot, pepper and mangetout, and frozen peas.

items.name: Egg and Tomato Vegetarian Stir-fry
items.description: Juicy tomatoes mingle with softly scrambled eggs in a saucy dish that's delicious over rice.

items.name: Spicy Jelly Noodles
items.description: Jelly noodles made with starch and water, with a spicy flavor.

items.name: Dumplings in Veggie Soup
items.description: Dumplings served in a mixed vegetable soup.

items.name: Softdrink
items.description: Choice between Fanta, Coke, Solo and Mountain Dew.

items.name: Brekkie Wrap
items.description: Scrambled eggs, baby spinach & bacon on toasted wrap.

items.name: Omlette
items.description: Omlette with roasted vegetables and cheese.

items.name: Eggs on Toast
items.description: Two free range eggs on toast with house made tomato relish.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: Seasonal fruit salad with creamy vanilla yoghurt and house muesli.

items.name: Vanilla Pancakes
items.description: Pancakes served with maple syrup, chocolate sause & nutella.

items.name: Banana, Pear or Raspberry Bread
items.description: Choice of bread with Banana, Pear or Raspberry falvor.

items.name: Chocolate Frappe
items.description: Iced drink with blended chocolate explosion topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.

items.name: Iced Coffee, Iced Chocolate, Spiders
items.description: Irresistable cold beverages, Iced Coffee, Iced Chocolate or Spiders.

items.name: Signature Hot Chocolate
items.description: Our finest flowing milk or dark chocolate, combined with freshly frothed milk for a pure chocolate indulgence.

items.name: Iced Chocolate
items.description: Choose from milk or dark chocolate, blended with ice cream, ice, milk and topped with ice cream and chocolate flakes.

items.name: Ham and Cheese Croissant
items.description: Crossiant served warm made with ham and melted cheese.

items.name: Chicken and Herb Roll
items.description: Chicken with garlic and herb mayonnaise on a seeded roll.

items.name: Salted Caramel Cake
items.description: Dark chocolate mousse, crunchy hazelnut and salted caramel ganache on a Lindt chocolate brownie base.

items.name: Opera
items.description: A layered cake of dark chocolate ganache, coffee buttercream and almond sponge.

items.name: Signature Waffle
items.description: A freshly made waffle served with vanilla white chocolate ice cream and a pot of chocolate.

items.name: Molten Lava Cake
items.description: An indulgent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate centre served with vanilla white chocolate ice cream.

items.name: Mud Crab Salad
items.description: Hand-picked mud crab salad with salted duck egg mayonnaise.

items.name: Sashimi
items.description: Hiramasa Kingfish sashimi with sushi rice, celery and aged mirin.

items.name: Chinese Roast Pigeon
items.description: Chinese roast pigeon with native tamarind, shark's fin melon, hot sweet and sour sauce.

items.name: Lamb Pastrami
items.description: Tea smoked lamb pastrami with lap chuong, eggplant and black bean sauce.

items.name: Chestnut and Artichoke Pie
items.description: Chestnut and Jerusalem artichoke pie with barigoule sauce.

items.name: Passionfruit Souffle
items.description: Passionfruit souffle served with passionfruit ice cream.

items.name: Date Tart
items.description: Interplay between the barely sweet aromatic custard, the sticky candy sweet dates and crisp short pastry.

items.name: Apricot Fondant
items.description: Warm apricot fondant with spiced biscuit and almond ice cream.

items.name: Minestrone Soup
items.description: Seasonal vegetables, white beans, kidney beans, borlotti beans, parmesan cheese, crusty Italian bread.

items.name: Bruschetta di Pomodoro
items.description: Cherry tomatoes, Spanish onion, basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic reduction, parmesan, crusty ciabatta.

items.name: Oven Baked Crusty Ciabatta Bread
items.description: Crusty Italian bread, pesto or semi-dried tomato tapenade.

items.name: Spaghetti Meatballs
items.description: Traditional home-made meatballs, Napoli sauce.

items.name: Carbonara
items.description: Smoky bacon, garlic, cracked pepper, shallots, egg, cream, parmesan cheese sauce.

items.name: Lasagne di Casa
items.description: Homemade pasta sheets, béchamel, bolognese, parmesan.

items.name: Mexicana Pizza
items.description: Ham, pepperoni, capsicum, onion.

items.name: Vegetarian Pizza
items.description: Mushrooms, onion, capsicum, pineapple, olives.

items.name: Double Chocolate Fudge Sundae
items.description: Two scoops of our rich chocolate ice cream topped with hot fudge.

items.name: Chocolate Factory Special Sundae
items.description: Two scoops of Chocolate Factory Special ice cream (swiss chocolate mint with fudge and chips) topped with hot fudge.

items.name: Fudge Pecan Sundae
items.description: Two scoops of vanilla ice cream covered with hot fudge and pecans. (no almonds)

items.name: Fudge Brownie
items.description: Fudge Brownie without any nuts.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Hot Chocolate topped with whipped cream and chocolate chips.

items.name: Banana Split
items.description: The classic split. With vanilla, strawberry, and chocolate ice cream and strawberry, pineapple and chocolate toppings.

items.name: The Cornucopia
items.description: There’s four pounds of ice cream in this horn of plenty! All the good things The Chocolate Factory has to offer, including all the toppings. Feeds ten adults or one hungry teenager.

items.name: Oh Fudge!
items.description: Our very own homemade milk chocolate hot fudge sundae. The star of our show. Two scoops of vanilla ice cream and hot fudge.

items.name: Entree Platter For Two
items.description: Hervey Bay Scallops served in shell, Chargrilled King Prawns, Assorted Mixed Mornay and Kilpatrick Oysters.

items.name: Fisherman’s Basket
items.description: Fried Catch of the Day , Tempura Soft Shell Crab, Golden Tempura King Prawns, Panko Crumbed Calamari Rings with Chips & Homemade Tartare Sauce.

items.name: Vegetable Linguine
items.description: In a Roast Tomato & Chilli Sauce with assorted seasonal Sauteed Vegetables & Parmesan.

items.name: Crab Ravioli
items.description: Wilted Baby Spinach and Pernod Cream.

items.name: Salt and Pepper Calamari
items.description: Baby Calamari with Passionfruit Dressing.

items.name: Crème Brulee
items.description: Served with a Chocolate & Almond Biscotti.

items.name: Dessert Extravaganza (to Share)
items.description: Platter of Chocolate Coated Crunchy Tiramisu with Salted Caramel & Hazelnut Crunch Filling served with a Macaron & Snickers Ice Cream, Crème Brulee of the day with Chocolate & Almond Biscotti & Seasonal fruits.

items.name: Sundae Dream
items.description: Trio of Ice Creams, Marshmallows & Chocolate Surprise.

items.name: Big Mac
items.description: Big Mac® Bun, Big Mac® Sauce, Regular Onions, Shredded Lettuce, Pickles, Sliced Cheese, 2 x Regular Meat Patties, Salt & Pepper.

items.description: Regular Bun, Tartare Sauce, Fillet- O- Fish® Portion, 1/2 Cheese Slice.

items.name: Double Quarter Pounder Value Meal
items.description: Quarter Pounder® Bun, Mustard, Ketchup, Slivered Onions, Pickles, Sliced Cheese, Qtr lb Meat Patty, Salt and Pepper.

items.name: Hotcakes with Butter & Syrup
items.description: Start your day the McDonald's® way, with the great feeling of pouring sweet syrup over melting whipped butter, watching while it seeps between the layers of fluffy, warm hotcakes. Soft, sweet and delicious breakfast.

items.name: Hash Brown
items.description: Get 'em hot. A crunchy, golden brown crust with steaming, fluffy potato inside.

items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: Crisp pastry, lovingly filled with aussie apples for that extra sweet taste. Served piping hot.

items.description: Creamy chocolate syrup with whipped cream.
